title: R.C. Sproul - Knowing Scripture
description:
Dr. R.C. Sproul helps us dig out the meaning of Scripture for ourselves. He lays the groundwork by discussing why we should study the Bible and how our own personal study relates to interpretation. Then he presents in simple basic terms the science of interpretation and gives practical guidelines for applying this science. 

************************************************************************************

Language: English / Video Format: FLV

01 Why Study the Bible
02 Private Interpretation
03 The Science of Interpretation
04 Literal Interpretation
05 Literary Forms Pt. 1
06 Literary Forms Pt. 2
07 Reading the Bible Existentially
08 The Historical Narrative
09 The Explicit and the Implicit
10 Parallelisms
11 Scripture and Culture
12 Principle vs. Custom
